author: Jake Rill
title: 2020 NHL Mock Draft: Full Round 1 Projections for Every Team
description: This year's  NHL  draft will likely be different from most. And that's because of the coronavirus pandemic that has created uncertainty across the sports world...
content:
Vaughn Ridley/Getty Images
This year's NHL draft will likely be different from most. And that's because of the coronavirus pandemic that has created uncertainty across the sports world.
